title: Ijeoma Oluo & April Salazar: StorySLAM Favorites
teaser: Ijeoma Oluo's mother teaches her how to turn bad situations into adventures and April Salazar goes to a pro-choice rally with her stepfather.
description: Storytellers Ijeoma Oluo and April SalazarHosted by Dan KennedyAudio Production by Whitney Jones Files are as they appeared on the podcast some stories include explicit language. Certain words may need to be bleeped to meet specific broadcast standards.
